SQLFunctionSpec.Name: USR_UFN_BUILDURL_FOR_PAGEID_RECORDID
SQLFunctionSpec.Description: Build URL For Pageid and RecordID
SQLFunctionSpec.Author: Styons Software
SQLFunctionSpec.CreateFunctionSQL:
create function dbo.USR_UFN_BUILDURL_FOR_PAGEID_RECORDID ( @PAGEID nvarchar(50), @RECORDID nvarchar(50) ) returns nvarchar(1000) with execute as caller as begin declare @url nvarchar(1000) = '' --select * from pagedefinitioncatalog where id = '8142773c-ca9b-4f4d-83a7-bdd306394838' --declare @pageid uniqueidentifier = '8142773c-ca9b-4f4d-83a7-bdd306394838'
declare @siteinfoid NVARCHAR(50) SELECT @siteinfoid = CONVERT(NVARCHAR(50), value) from fn_listextendedproperty('Hosting_SiteInfoID', default, default, default, default, default, default)
declare @databasename NVARCHAR(100) SELECT @databasename = CONVERT(NVARCHAR(50), value) from fn_listextendedproperty('Hosting_DatabaseDisplayName', default, default, default, default, default, default)
if @databasename is null or 0 = len(@databasename) begin select @databasename = value from setting where name = 'BBAppFXDatabaseToUse' end
SET @URL = @URL + COALESCE(dbo.UFN_GETAPPLICATIONROOTURL(), '') IF RIGHT(@URL, 1) <> '/' SET @URL = @URL + '/'; SET @URL = @URL + N'webui/webshellpage.aspx';
IF @siteinfoid IS NOT null and 0 < len(@siteinfoid) BEGIN SET @URL = @URL + '?SITEINFOID=' + @siteinfoid SET @URL = @URL + '&HOSTEDSITEINFOID=' + @siteinfoid END SET @URL = @URL + N'&databasename=' + COALESCE(@databasename, db_name(), '') SET @URL = @URL + N'#pageType=p&pageId=' + COALESCE(@PAGEID , '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') SET @URL = @URL + N'&recordId=' + COALESCE(@RECORDID , '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') set @url = replace(@url,'webshellpage.aspx&','webshellpage.aspx?') return @URL end
